content.question:
​

Moving clockwise from left, the circle passes through the points:

B (negative 5 comma 0)

A (5 comma 0)

The circle is divided into eight equal sectors with two sectors per quadrant. Alternating sectors are shaded.

A point X is marked on the circumference of the circle, in quadrant 3, on the unshaded sector between the negative y axis and the radius dividing the spinner in quadrant 3.

A ray appears in quadrant 3 from the origin through point X.

​The figure shows a spinner with eight congruent sectors in the <math alttext="x y"><semantics><mrow><mi>x</mi><mi>y</mi></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>-plane. The origin and three points are labeled. If the coordinates of <math alttext="X"><semantics><mi>X</mi><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> are <math alttext="open parentheses negative 5 over 2 comma fraction numerator negative 5 square root of 3 over denominator 2 end fraction close parentheses"><semantics><mfenced><mrow><mo>-</mo><mfrac><mn>5</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mo>,</mo><mfrac><mrow><mo>-</mo><mn>5</mn><msqrt><mn>3</mn></msqrt></mrow><mn>2</mn></mfrac></mrow></mfenced><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>, what is the measure of angle <math alttext="X O B"><semantics><mrow><mi>X</mi><mi>O</mi><mi>B</mi></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> ?

choices.label: ​<math alttext="fraction numerator 7 pi over denominator 6 end fraction"><semantics><mfrac><mrow><mn>7</mn><mi>π</mi></mrow><mn>6</mn></mfrac><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>

​<math alttext="fraction numerator 4 pi over denominator 3 end fraction"><semantics><mfrac><mrow><mn>4</mn><mi>π</mi></mrow><mn>3</mn></mfrac><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>

skill.text: Skill 3.B: Apply numerical results in a given mathematical or applied context.
